title: A Predator: An Alexander Wright Mystery Adventure
description: A significant weekend in Alex Wrightâ€™s life begins with the public viewing of his warehouse renovation and ends with a cry for help from an 83-year-old woman being foreclosed and thrown out of her home. Two murders and an encounter with a ruthless Russian oligarch lead our hero into a search through Baja California for the man with the answers.
author: William Mansfield
